last_episode_to_air.name: The Fate of Danger (2)
last_episode_to_air.overview: Kid Danger and Captain Man battle Drex on top of a blimp to stop him from erasing Swellview's memory of Captain Man. But when the blimp aims straight for the Swellview Baby Hospital, one hero must stay behind to save the day.

name: Henry Danger
overview: When 13-year-old Henry Hart lands a job as Danger, the sidekick-in-training to superhero Captain Man, he must learn to navigate a double life balancing the challenges of 8th grade with the crazy adventures of a real-life crime fighter!

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: A new part-time job forces Henry Hart to balance two lives, one as a typical teenager and the other as secret superhero sidekick Kid Danger.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: Young Henry Hart continues secretly assisting the crime-fighting efforts of the silly and virtually indestructible superhero Captain Man.

seasons.name: Season 3
seasons.overview: As Henry keeps up with student life, he takes on more superhero responsibilities after school, including brave rescues and a brand-new superpower.

episodes.name: The Danger Begins
episodes.overview: A 13-year-old boy lands a job as a sidekick to a superhero, and he must now keep his identity a secret.

episodes.name: Mo' Danger, Mo' Problems
episodes.overview: As Henry tries to adjust to his new role as Kid Danger, he struggles to balance his schedule between crime fighting, school, family and friends.

episodes.name: The Secret Gets Out
episodes.overview: Henry's life as Kid Danger is threatened when Charlotte grows suspicious about the secrets he has been keeping.

episodes.name: Tears of the Jolly Beetle
episodes.overview: Captain Man loses his powers of invulnerability and he becomes too afraid to fight crime.

episodes.name: Substitute Teacher
episodes.overview: When a suspicious new student shows up at school, Charlotte and Henry think he may be up to something. Captain Man goes undercover as a substitute teacher to learn more.

episodes.name: Jasper Danger
episodes.overview: When Jasper is Kid Danger for Halloween, Captain Man mistakes him being Kid Danger instead of Henry. So it is now up to Jasper to save Halloween.

episodes.name: The Space Rock
episodes.overview: When a piece of rock from outer space is more than it seems, trouble follows Henry to his home.

episodes.name: Birthday Girl Down
episodes.overview: An accusation prevents Henry from being invited to a girl's birthday party.

episodes.name: Too Much Game
episodes.overview: Henry believes that he was replaced on the basketball team by an older boy.

episodes.name: Henry the Man-Beast
episodes.overview: A device in the man cave meant to make men stronger, more powerful, and "manlier", strikes Henry when he accidentally pushes a button on the machine. The effect makes him grow facial hair and increases his adrenaline making him angry, eventually turning him "beastly." Captain Man, Schwoz, and Charlotte rush to find Henry but do not arrive before his crazy behavior ruins his date with Chloe.

episodes.name: Invisible Brad
episodes.overview: Captain Man's invisible friend named Brad visits as Henry and Charlotte meet him. Things get worse when Brad wants to become Captain Man's new sidekick by trying to get Henry to quit. Meanwhile, Jasper fixes up Piper's old playhouse in the backyard so that it can be sold in order for Piper to get a Yo-Pro Camera.

episodes.name: Spoiler Alert
episodes.overview: Henry and Captain Man must deal with the Spoiler, an annoying new teenage supervillain that finds out the endings of TV shows and movies and tells people about it before they see it. Meanwhile, Piper tries to get into the Man Fans (a Captain Man fan club) led by Paula Makioto and goes through the initiation process with the latest one involving get a selfie with Captain Man.

episodes.name: Let's Make a Steal
episodes.overview: Henry is volunteered to be on the game show "Spin and Win" in order to investigate a string of robberies of prizes stolen from the winners of the show. Meanwhile, Jasper gets a broken nose after Piper accidentally hits him with a "selfie stick" when fighting with an usher.

episodes.name: Super Volcano
episodes.overview: Henry and Ray think the world is ending when a dormant super volcano under Swellview becomes active. Piper is convinced that she has gluten intolerance.

episodes.name: My Phony Valentine
episodes.overview: When Henry's crush goes on a date with someone else, Schwoz provides an android to make her jealous. Ray has an unpleasant date with one of Henry's teachers.

episodes.name: Caved In
episodes.overview: Henry, Charlotte and Ray are trapped inside when Jasper accidentally triggers the emergency lockdown mode for Junk-N-Stuff and the Man Cave.

episodes.name: Elevator Kiss
episodes.overview: Kid Danger rescues Bianca and they share a kiss. Henry is upset when he realizes that Bianca kissed Kid Danger.

episodes.name: Man of the House
episodes.overview: After Henry's mother's purse is stolen, Captain Man decides he must move in with Henry's family in order to protect them.

episodes.name: Dream Busters
episodes.overview: A villain's dream beam traps Henry in a dream state from which only Charlotte can rescue him.

episodes.name: Kid Grounded
episodes.overview: Henry gets grounded by his parents for sneaking out. While he and Piper are grounded, a deal is made that if they can go through 24 hours without arguing, they can be ungrounded where failure has their grounding extended to a month. While Henry is indisposed, Charlotte fills in as the acting Kid Danger to help Captain Man out.

episodes.name: Captain Jerk
episodes.overview: Captain Man tries to boost his image by holding a contest where three winners get a tour of his secret lair.

episodes.name: The Bucket Trap
episodes.overview: Henry and Charlotte want to tell Jasper that Henry is really Kid Danger, so they decide to give him a test secret to prove that he is ready.

episodes.name: Henry & the Bad Girl (1)
episodes.overview: A graffiti gang is spray-painting all over Swellview. While trying to track down a gang leader, Kid Danger is tempted by a cute girl in the gang.

episodes.name: Henry & the Bad Girl (2)
episodes.overview: Captain Man searches desperately for his missing sidekick after Kid Danger goes rogue and joins a gang of graffiti artists.

episodes.name: Jasper's Real Girlfriend
episodes.overview: When Jasper's summer camp girlfriend comes to town, she quickly grows jealous thinking that Charlotte is in love with Jasper.

1.name: Season 1
1.overview: A new part-time job forces Henry Hart to balance two lives, one as a typical teenager and the other as secret superhero sidekick Kid Danger.

episodes.name: The Beat Goes On
episodes.overview: Dr. Minyak makes Charlotte an excessively strong individual who can abduct Kid Danger and Captain Man.

episodes.name: One Henry, Three Girls (1)
episodes.overview: Henry still has feelings for Veronica but gets jealous when he sees Bianca with a new student. A Mad Granny is terrorizing Captain Man at public appearances.

episodes.name: One Henry, Three Girls (2)
episodes.overview: Conclusion. Henry has plans to attend the school dance, but Kid Danger must also appear there, which makes Henry's life very complicated.

episodes.name: Henry & the Woodpeckers
episodes.overview: When Piper's basketball coach quits, Henry becomes the coach of Piper's team; Henry is challenged by the League Board and its unorthodox rules.

episodes.name: Captain Man: On Vacation
episodes.overview: Henry and Charlotte are in charge of protecting Swellview while Ray is out of town at his cousin's wedding

episodes.name: The Time Jerker
episodes.overview: When Kid Danger and Captain Man battle the Time Bandit, Kid Danger accidentally falls into the Time Bandit's time machine and relives the same day over again.

episodes.name: Secret Beef
episodes.overview: Henry decides to bring his boss to Swellview's most exclusive restaurant.

episodes.name: Henry's Jelly
episodes.overview: Henry wants recognition for Kid Danger's heroics, especially after Jasper is praised as a hero.

episodes.name: Christmas Danger
episodes.overview: Captain Man gets arrested and must spend Christmas in jail, so Henry and Charlotte do their best to cheer him up.

episodes.name: Indestructible Henry (1)
episodes.overview: When Kid Danger is almost badly injured on a mission, Henry decides to go through the Densitizer to become indestructible like Captain Man.

episodes.name: Indestructible Henry (2)
episodes.overview: When Henry gets an unexpected side-effect from going through the Densiziter, he must hide the side-effect from his family at dinner while the gang works to help Henry return to his normal self.

episodes.name: Text Lies & Video
episodes.overview: When a video of Henry and Ray transforming into Kid Danger and Captain Man gets out, Henry must go to great lengths to retrieve it and protect his secret identity.

episodes.name: Opposite Universe
episodes.overview: Henry and Charlotte travel to an opposite universe where evil counterparts of Ray and Schwoz want to destroy Piper.

episodes.name: Grave Danger
episodes.overview: When Ray starts behaving strangely, Henry and Charlotte investigate and are surprised to discover the cause of his behavior.

episodes.name: Ox Pox
episodes.overview: When Piper gets a mysterious illness, Captain Man must travel back in time to the 1700s to find the only cure.

episodes.name: Twin Henrys
episodes.overview: Henry has a shape-shifting android fill in at a family dinner so that he can watch an MMA fight with Charlotte and Ray.

episodes.name: Danger & Thunder
episodes.overview: Captain Man, Kid Danger and Phoebe Thunderman infiltrate a secret villain meeting in Swellview; Phoebe discovers an unexpected attendee at the meeting.

episodes.name: I Know Your Secret
episodes.overview: When Henry receives a series of mysterious notes from someone, he begins to worry that the sender may know his secret identity.

2.name: Season 2
2.overview: Young Henry Hart continues secretly assisting the crime-fighting efforts of the silly and virtually indestructible superhero Captain Man.

episodes.name: A Fiñata Full of Death Bugs
episodes.overview: When a dangerous piñata winds up at a child's birthday party, Kid Danger and Captain Man must go under cover to step in before it is too late.

episodes.name: Love Muffin
episodes.overview: Henry and Charlotte discover things are not what they seem when Captain Man suddenly announces his plans to marry.

episodes.name: Scream Machine
episodes.overview: When Charlotte's invention for a TV show is accidentally destroyed and then rebuilt, Charlotte worries that the attention she gets could expose Kid Danger and Captain Man's secret identity.

episodes.name: Mouth Candy
episodes.overview: When Jasper is falsely accused of a burglary and sent to jail, Henry and Ray must find a way to set him free.

episodes.name: The Trouble with Frittles
episodes.overview: Captain Man and Kid Danger find themselves in the middle of a debate about Swellview's favorite snack.

episodes.name: Hour of Power
episodes.overview: A dangerous criminal escapes from Swellview prison, embarrasses Kid Danger and traps Captain Man in a helmet; Kid Danger must use the help of Schwoz to gain a super power.

episodes.name: Dodging Danger
episodes.overview: After Henry uses his new power to compete in a Dodge-A-Leen tournament, Ray, Schwoz and Charlotte go under cover to teach Henry a lesson.

episodes.name: Double Date Danger
episodes.overview: Miss Shapen's niece, Noel, is visiting Swellview and she has Henry offer his house to Noel.

episodes.name: Space Invaders (1)
episodes.overview: Captain Man and Kid Danger learn that an astronaut has been taken hostage aboard the Space Station, and set off on a space rescue.

episodes.name: Space Invaders (2)
episodes.overview: On the space station, Captain Man and Kid Danger discover a little girl took the astronauts hostage; after realizing the astronauts perform experiments on bunnies, Captain Man and Kid Danger decide to help her.

episodes.name: Gas or Fail
episodes.overview: When Captain Man finds himself trapped underground, Henry must devise a way to sneak out of his school's standardized testing to save Ray.

episodes.name: JAM Session
episodes.overview: When Ray hears that Piper is going to Junior Anger Management to work on her anger issues, he makes a wager with Henry that he can make her lose her temper before the night ends.

episodes.name: License to Fly
episodes.overview: Ray agrees to let Henry fly his helicopter, but Ray starts to act like a nervous parent; Charlotte, Jasper and Piper find a cotton candy machine.

episodes.name: Green Fingers
episodes.overview: After Schwoz creates a disease that accidentally effects Charlotte, Henry, his family, and even Ray, he quarantines them in Henry's house in order to find a cure.

episodes.name: Stuck in Two Holes
episodes.overview: Charlotte and Jasper must come to the rescue when Captain Man and Kid Danger are each stuck in a hole.

episodes.name: Live & Dangerous: Part 1
episodes.overview: Captain Man and Kid Danger are invited by a famous Internet celebrity to attend his party, but when they arrive, they discover the party is not what it appeared to be; Charlotte babysits Piper.

episodes.name: Live & Dangerous: Part 2
episodes.overview: Frankini has announced his plan to unmask Kid Danger and Captain Man.

3.name: Season 3
3.overview: As Henry keeps up with student life, he takes on more superhero responsibilities after school, including brave rescues and a brand-new superpower.

episodes.name: Sick & Wired
episodes.overview: Thinking that Henry is not telling the truth about being sick, Ray plants cameras and microphones in Henry's house to catch him in a lie.

episodes.name: Brawl in the Hall
episodes.overview: When Charlotte is challenged to a fight at school, Captain Man and Kid Danger step in to try and help Charlotte defend herself.

episodes.name: The Rock Box Dump
episodes.overview: When a report comes out that Kid Danger's super power is actually an illness, Kid Danger has to convince Swellview that it is a huge misunderstanding.

episodes.name: Danger Games
episodes.overview: When Dr. Minyak plans to ruin Double G's worldwide charity concert, Captain Man and Kid Danger join forces with the Game Shakers to defeat Dr. Minyak and keep Double G safe.

episodes.name: Toon in for Danger
episodes.overview: Henry and Ray get a copy of the new Kid Danger and Captain Man cartoon and see that it's horrible; they must hurry to fix the cartoon before its big premiere party.

episodes.name: Meet Cute Crush
episodes.overview: Henry and Ray try to help Piper carry out a “meet cute” with a new boy she likes from school.

episodes.name: Back to the Danger (1)
episodes.overview: Henry and Ray try to help Piper carry out a “meet cute” with a new boy she likes from school.

episodes.name: Back to the Danger (2)
episodes.overview: When Drex prevents Young Ray from ever being densitized in the past, Henry and a now-destructible Ray must take on Drex and help Ray get back his indestructibility.

episodes.name: Budget Cuts
episodes.overview: When the Vice Mayor cuts Captain Man and Kid Danger's budget to build a high-speed railway in Swellview, the duo must figure out creative ways to save money.

episodes.name: Diamonds Are for Heather
episodes.overview: Kid Danger and Captain Man are called to the Swellview Museum of Stools and Jewels to prevent the rare Neal Diamond from being stolen.

episodes.name: Car Trek
episodes.overview: Charlotte's birthday road trip to see the Boo Man Group perform gets sidetracked by a Captain Man and Kid Danger emergency.

episodes.name: Toddler Invasion
episodes.overview: When The Toddler takes control of the Man Cave, Charlotte and Jasper have to find a way to sneak in and save Kid Danger and Captain Man.

episodes.name: Captain Man-kini
episodes.overview: When a new internet celebrity causes havoc in Swellview, Captain Man has to swap bodies with Frankini to infiltrate his secret lair.

episodes.name: Saturday Night Lies
episodes.overview: When Ray runs into an ex-girlfriend, he tries to impress her by pretending that Henry, Charlotte and Jasper are his children.

episodes.name: Henry's Frittle Problem
episodes.overview: When Henry's dad gets an offer for a new job in Bordertown, Henry and Ray go undercover to try and stop Henry's dad from getting the job and prevent Henry from having to move.

episodes.name: Spelling Bee Hard
episodes.overview: Dr. Minyak challenges Captain Man to a spelling bee.

episodes.name: Up the Stairs
episodes.overview: When a celebrity chef makes a surprise visit to Junk-n-Stuff, Henry and Captain Man are stuck in the man cave and try to get to the store to be on the TV show.

episodes.name: Danger Things
episodes.overview: When Piper is taken by a creature from another dimension, Captain Man and Kid Danger must rescue her from the evil science corporation that opened the portal.

episodes.name: Rubber Duck
episodes.overview: When Ray accidentally destroys Henry's dad's prized remote-control car, they throw a manicure party to raise money to fix it.

episodes.name: Flabber Gassed
episodes.overview: After acting too confident before a fight, Kid Danger & Captain Man are sprayed with Flabber Gas making them powerless to defeat a new villain in Swellview. Schwoz puts our heroes in Exo-Suits which Charlotte and Jasper control.

episodes.name: Henry's Birthday
episodes.overview: While trying to celebrate his birthday, Henry keeps getting interrupted by crimes going on in Swellview.

episodes.name: Whistlin' Susie
episodes.overview: After accidentally activating an atomic bomb in the Man Cave, Ray and Henry decide to drive it out into the Swellview desert in order to save their city.

episodes.name: Thumb War
episodes.overview: Captain Man and Kid Danger are upset when a new crime-fighting team emerges in town. However, they discover that the new-duo are their biggest fans. After an unfortunate incident, the Thumb Buddies seek revenge on our heroes.

episodes.name: The Great Cactus Con
episodes.overview: Jasper gets the chance to take his crush to Cactus Con, but when a mysterious villain gets involved in the convention, the entire gang is forced into action.

episodes.name: Part 1: A New Evil
episodes.overview: Henry is trapped at home with his family while Captain Man heads out to save the founder of TwitFlash; Charlotte and Schwoz put together a mystery that could change the world forever.

episodes.name: Part 2: A New Darkness
episodes.overview: After a criminal steals Kid Danger's superpower and learns his secret identity, goons are sent to Henry's house to attack; while Henry and Ray fight to protect Henry's family, Jasper, Charlotte, and Schwoz work to get his power back.

episodes.name: Part 3: A New Hero
episodes.overview: Schwoz works to create an anti-virus to stop an evil plan; Kid Danger and Captain Man battle a villain; Kid Danger's heroism is put to the ultimate test as they fight to save the world.

episodes.name: Broken Armed and Dangerous
episodes.overview: When Kid Danger publicly breaks his arm, Henry and the gang have to find a way to keep his secret safe.

episodes.name: Knight & Danger
episodes.overview: When the Knight Squad's archenemy, Ryker, is unleashed on Swellview, Kid Danger and Captain Man take him down to Burger Castle only to be tricked into joining forces with the villain.

episodes.name: Grand Theft Otto
episodes.overview: When Piper's school parrot, Otto, starts to repeat that Henry is Kid Danger, Henry and Jasper have to stall until Ray, Charlotte and Schwoz can find a way to fix things.

episodes.name: The Whole Bilsky Family
episodes.overview: Henry's nerves are tested when Piper invites her new boyfriend and his family over for dinner.

guest_stars.character: KLVY News Hair / Makeup Artist / Mail Carrier
guest_stars.name: Kalia Fullerton

episodes.name: Secret Room
episodes.overview: After Schwoz's family reunion causes chaos in the Man Cave, Captain Man reveals a "Superheroes Only" room in the Man Cave for peace and quiet. Jealous, Charlotte, Jasper and Schwoz make a cooler room to show them up. As the gang fights over who gets the better room, things get blown out of proportion.

episodes.name: My Dinner with Bigfoot
episodes.overview: When the gang befriends Bigfoot in the woods, Kid Danger and Captain Man try to help get rid of a pesky hunter that's been trying to capture him.

episodes.name: Charlotte Gets Ghosted
episodes.overview: Schwoz invents a vacuum to help Henry clean his house, but it accidentally sucks Charlotte inside; when Henry's family hears Charlotte and thinks the vacuum is haunted, Ray must distract them while Henry finds a way to get her out.

episodes.name: I Dream of Danger
episodes.overview: When Charlotte has a dream where she nearly kisses Kid Danger, she actively tries to avoid Henry for fear of the dream coming true.

episodes.name: Holey Moley
episodes.overview: The gang thinks they have found the perfect tunnels to access all of Swellview, until they are confronted by the tunnels' original inhabitants.

episodes.name: Love Bytes
episodes.overview: Things get a little buggy when Schwoz installs a new operating system on the Man Cave Computer designed to detect and eliminate threats all over Swellview.

episodes.name: Double-O Danger
episodes.overview: Kid Danger and Captain Man attempt to capture Mob Boss Rob Moss by infiltrating his daughter's the sweet sixteen birthday party.

episodes.name: Massage Chair
episodes.overview: When Captain Man shows up with a cool new massage chair, Henry, Charlotte, and Jasper compete in a series of physical and mental challenges to see who wins the chair.

episodes.name: Henry Danger: The Musical
episodes.overview: When Frankini uses a device to put a musical curse over Swellview, Kid Danger and Captain Man are forced to find a way to stop him. But when Captain Man cracks under the pressure, it’s up to Kid Danger to remind him how to be a hero again.

guest_stars.character: KLVY News Hair / Makeup Artist / Mail Carrier
guest_stars.name: Kalia Fullerton

episodes.name: Sister Twister (1)
episodes.overview: Packages are being stolen from Swellview porches. Henry and Ray setup a stakeout in an attempt to catch the thief red-handed.

episodes.name: Sister Twister (2)
episodes.overview: When Ray's memories accidentally get erased, Schwoz devises a plan to send Henry deep inside Ray's brain to get them back.

episodes.name: A Tale of Two Pipers
episodes.overview: Henry gets an unexpected visitor claiming to be from the future. When a boy-robot killing machine steps onto the scene, The Gang must find a way to save everyone from an apocalyptic future.

episodes.name: Story Tank
episodes.overview: Big steaks are on the line when Henry claims he can’t be scared. Schwoz uses a machine that allows Henry to virtually experience the spooky stories that everyone in the Man Cave tells him in an attempt to prove Henry wrong.

episodes.name: Captain Mom
episodes.overview: Captain Man is being a baby about having a baby. Labor pains leave him helpless so Kid Danger and Piper step up to take on a couple of slick grease thieves.

episodes.name: Visible Brad
episodes.overview: Captain Man and Kid Danger are going to need a little bit of magic and some help from an old friend if they want to catch a thief.

episodes.name: EnvyGram Wall
episodes.overview: Captain Man and Kid Danger are guarding Swellview's newest attraction, the EnvyGram Wall, when Captain Man destroys the wall while trying to eliminate a small bird. Kid Danger and Captain Man have to figure out a way to replace it.

episodes.name: Holiday Punch
episodes.overview: A new species of moth is eating all the Christmas trees in Swellview, so Captain Man and Kid Danger head over to Neighborville to buy more. On the way back they're attacked by shady tree dealers and have to fight to save Christmas.

episodes.name: Mr. Nice Guy
episodes.overview: A vigilante in a smiley-face mask has been punishing Swellviewians for being rude in public. Kid Danger and Captain Man’s investigation leads them to the TV set of Mr. Wallabee, a local TV celebrity who hosts a show for kids.

episodes.name: Theranos Boot
episodes.overview: Henry and the other kids destroy Ray’s prized movie prop, The Theranos Boot. To replace it, Henry and Jasper travel to an alternate universe Man Cave using Bill Evil’s inter-dimensional transporter and steal their Theranos Boot before Ray finds out.

episodes.name: Rumblr
episodes.overview: Captain Man, sick of fighting the same old villains, is convinced to make a profile on a match making app for heroes and villains. Kid Danger agrees to do the same and two of them set up a double-fight to square off with some new villains.

episodes.name: Cave the Date
episodes.overview: Henry and the gang set up a secret underground restaurant in the Man Cave for Charlotte's private dinner with music superstar Jack Swagger. When word gets out that Jack Swagger is in town, some unwanted guests crash the party.

episodes.name: Escape Room
episodes.overview: Kid Danger and Captain Man are tricked into entering an escape room by a factory owner with a "chip" on his shoulder. They are trapped inside with two new kids, Mika and Miles, who are oddly good at solving the puzzles they need to answer to get out.

episodes.name: Game of Phones
episodes.overview: When a young girl chains herself outside of Junk-N-Stuff, Kid Danger and Captain Man are forced to help find her beloved phone. While on a stakeout, they unexpectedly run across some familiar faces with a devious plan they weren't prepared for.

episodes.name: Remember the Crimes
episodes.overview: Henry tells Piper about all the adventures she missed while he was off fighting alongside Captain Man as Kid Danger. But then Piper, Ray, Jasper, Charlotte, and Schwoz join in and share a few memories of their own.

episodes.name: The Beginning of the End
episodes.overview: Kid Danger reveals to Captain Man that he doesn't want to be stuck in Swellview and be his sidekick forever. To make matters worse, Kid Danger is recruited by another town to be their hero.

episodes.name: Captain Drex
episodes.overview: Captain Man's old sidekick and nemesis, Drex, returns from the past with an army of cavemen to finish off Captain Man once and for all. Kid Danger may be the only one who can save Captain Man now.

episodes.name: The Fate of Danger (1)
episodes.overview: Kid Danger and his friends try to figure out how to get Captain Man back from the past, while Drex furthers his scheme to erase Swellview's memory of Captain Man forever.

episodes.name: The Fate of Danger (2)
episodes.overview: Kid Danger and Captain Man battle Drex on top of a blimp to stop him from erasing Swellview's memory of Captain Man. But when the blimp aims straight for the Swellview Baby Hospital, one hero must stay behind to save the day.
